name: Leshy Adventures
description:
Leshy Adventures is a tough top-down shooter with a twist. Take control of a humble nature spirit and repel the intruders from your forest home using nothing but the products of your own plantlike body

Features
  • Tough top-down shooter gameplay with a twist: you must defeat enemies by pushing them onto each other or onto stage hazards
  • Chain enemy collisions to rack up a combo. Keep it high to earn more points, recover health and fill your special attack meter faster
  • 4 different special attacks to shake up the way you play
  • 5 difficulty settings so you can play at your own pace
  • Offline leaderboards keep track of your best runs
Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys
Z - Shoot
X - Cancel Shot
C - Special
ESC - Pause
